column4: we might have the same problem    I am able to boot from a CD and reinstall Ubuntu, but once in it, there is no in /dev for me either
Yeah... it's weird because the BIOS sees it fine and will boot to it
I suspect tehre is a kernel module that needs to be inserted, because for early 7.10 tribes, it worked for me
I havn't yet found the time to figure out which one
